name: factorio-admin-command-center
title: Factorio Admin Command Center
author: louanbastos
description: A powerful and intuitive GUI-based administration toolkit for Factorio. Provides instant access to over 20 categorized tools for editing, repairing, map cleanup, blueprint automation, recipe/tech unlocks, pollution control, enemy removal, and more. Features a sidebar tabbed interface, built-in Lua console, and full localization support. Designed for both singleplayer and multiplayer admins, accessible via GUI button or shortcut (CTRL + .).
